short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock your crypto wallet power! Input your wallet address, connect Twitter, and reveal how many pizza boxes are waiting!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the mystic power of your crypto wallet with our Chrome extension!

Simply input your Ethereum and Solana address, connect your Twitter account, and unveil the secret of how many pizza boxes await you.

Let the magic of blockchain fortune-telling reveal your delicious destiny!
